game.l_dis:
Sift Heads – Stickman Action Shooter Series

Sift Heads is a browser-based action game series where players control skilled bounty hunters, completing missions, taking down enemies, and collecting rewards. The games combine stickman-style graphics with strategic shooting and tactical gameplay.

What is Sift Heads?

The series follows Vinnie, Kiro, and Shorty as they execute missions for criminal organizations. Players must plan attacks, choose weapons, and upgrade characters to survive waves of enemies and complete increasingly complex levels.

How to Play Sift Heads?

  • Step 1: Select a mission or episode to play.
  • Step 2: Control your character using point-and-click mechanics for movement and aiming.
  • Step 3: Choose weapons and tactics to eliminate enemies efficiently.
  • Step 4: Earn money to unlock new weapons, abilities, and upgrades for characters.

Why Play Sift Heads Unblocked?

Sift Heads Unblocked allows you to enjoy the full series online without restrictions. Play anywhere to experience fast-paced stickman action, tactical shooting, and story-driven missions.

Key Features

  • Stickman Action: Simple, smooth controls with classic stickman graphics.
  • Mission-Based Gameplay: Complete objectives for criminal organizations and progress through the story.
  • Character Upgrades: Enhance abilities, weapons, and strategies as you advance.
  • Tactical Combat: Choose your approach—stealth, guns blazing, or strategic shooting.
  • Unblocked Online: Play in your browser without downloads or restrictions.

Lead Your Team to Victory!

Control Vinnie, Kiro, and Shorty in Sift Heads to complete missions, take down enemies, and upgrade your team for the ultimate stickman action experience!
